Subscription.Description: Certificate services received request, approved, issued, denied.
Subscription.Query: <QueryList><Query Id="1" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4886 or EventID=4887 or EventID=4888)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="2" Path="DNS Server"><Select Path="DNS Server">*[System[(EventID=150 or EventID=770)]]</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-DNSServer/Audit">*[System[(EventID=541)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="3" Path="Application"><Select Path="Application">*[System[Provider[@Name='EMET'] and (Level=2 or Level=3) and (EventID=1 or EventID=2)]]</Select><Suppress Path="Application">*[System[Provider[@Name='EMET'] and (EventID=0)]]</Suppress></Query><Query Id="4" Path="System"><Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Eventlog']]]</Select></Query><Query Id="5" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=1100 or EventID=1104 OR EventID=1105 OR EventID=1108)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="6"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-PnP/Configuration">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-PnP'] and Level=4 and EventID=410]] and *[EventData[Data[@Name='DriverName']="usbstor.inf"]] </Select></Query><Query Id="7" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID >=6419 and EventID <=6424)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="8"><Select Path="Security">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Eventlog'] and Level=4 and EventID=1102]]</Select></Query><Query Id="9"><Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Eventlog'] and Level=4 and EventID=104]]</Select></Query><Query Id="10" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4715 or EventID=4817 or EventID=4663 or EventID=4670)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="11" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4688)]]</Select><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4689)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="12" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4657)]] and ((*[EventData[Data[@Name="OperationType"] = "%%1904"]]) or (*[EventData[Data[@Name="OperationType"] = "%%1905"]]) or (*[EventData[Data[@Name="OperationType"] = "%%1906"]]))</Select></Query><Query Id="13" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational">*</Select></Query><Query Id="14" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=4616)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="15" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Defender/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Defender/Operational">*[System[( (EventID >= 1006 and EventID <= 1009) )]]</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Defender/Operational">*[System[( (EventID >= 1116 and EventID <= 1119) )]]</Select></Query></QueryList>
